bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_categoryToggle: Click here to add a Category.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_vendorToggle: Click here to add a vendor.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_EffectiveDate: Select the Effective date from here.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_NumberOfPieces: Enter the Minimum Order Quantity here.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_BasicRateBase: Enter Basic Rate/UOM; Basic Price will auto-calculate.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_condition: Click here to add a condition.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_cancel: Click here to go-back to the BOP (Domestic) Page.
bopDomesticForm.addBOPDomestic_save: Click here to save the BOP.
bopDomesticForm.AddBOPDomestic_sendForApproval: Click here to send the BOP for approval.

bopImportForm.addBOPDomestic_categoryToggle: Click here to add a category.
bopImportForm.addBOPDomestic_vendorToggle: Click here to add a vendor.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_incoTerms_container: Select Inco Terms from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.paymentTerm: Select the payment term from the dropdown.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_EffectiveDate: Select the Effective date from here.
bopImportForm.AddBOPImport_BasicRateSelectedCurrency: Enter Basic Rate/UOM (Currency); Basic Rate/UOM (INR) will auto-calculate.
bopImportForm.addBOPIMport_cancel: Click here to cancel the form and go back to the BOP (Import) Page.
bopImportForm.addBOPImport_save: Click here to save the BOP.
bopImportForm.addBOPIMport_sendForApproval: Click here to send the BOP Material for approval.

bopDomesticCategoryForm.AddBOPDomesticCategory_Cancel: Click here to go back to the BOP (Domestic) Page.
bopDomesticCategoryForm.AddBOPDomesticCategory_Save: Click here to save the category.
